basics.description: **Note:** Please refer to the following before installing the solution: • Review the solution [Release Notes](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/tree/master/Solutions/SOX%20IT%20Compliance/ReleaseNotes.md) • There may be [known issues](https://aka.ms/sentinelsolutionsknownissues) pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing. This workbook helps organizations monitor SOX (Sarbanes–Oxley) IT General Controls, including access governance, privileged activity, configuration changes, data integrity, and log monitoring. It consolidates data from Microsoft Entra ID, Defender for Identity, Microsoft 365, Azure Activity, SQL auditing, and Windows/Linux system logs. **Workbooks:** 1 [Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel](https://aka.ms/azuresentinel) | [Learn more about Solutions](https://aka.ms/azuresentinelsolutionsdoc)

options.text: This solution installs workbook(s) to help you gain insights into the telemetry collected in Microsoft Sentinel. After installing the solution, start using the workbook in Manage solution view.

This workbook helps you monitor, validate, and report on SOX IT General Controls (ITGC) including access control, change management, log integrity, privileged activity, and financial system monitoring. It consolidates data from Entra ID, Defender for Identity, Azure Activity, Microsoft 365, SecurityEvent logs, Behavior Analytics, and Azure SQL.
